fields.description:
Part of RHEL7 includes installing firewalld. Euca will NOT want firewalld to be on. 
# Need to describe how to turn it off. 
# Possibly also include troubleshooting (symptom/solution) that would describe what might happen if the customer forgets to turn it off.
# If a customer needs/uses firewalld, is that even possible? FAQ

Reference docs:
http://www.certdepot.net/rhel7-get-started-firewalld/
https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-set-up-a-firewall-using-firewalld-on-centos-7
And:
https://linuxconfig.org/how-to-stop-start-and-disable-enable-firewall-on-redhat-7-linux-system
http://getkt.com/start-firewalld-centos/
fields.summary: Document how to turn off firewalld

comments.body: Need to convert this to a DOC ticket.
This was converted from a sub-task of EUCA-11595 - so associate it back.
We should have an example of what an enabled firewalld looks like and how to address that.

Hi [~gholms] wanted to get down some pseudo doc content to vet the doc direction on this ticket. I have some questions highlighted in the attachment. And it seems to me that the upgrade strategy will determine how and where I put the content in the doc set.

Please let me know if I'm way off target. thanks, kjm

New section:
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#install-guide/upgrade_rhel7_firewalld.html
[~gholms] any errors or omissions in the above section? And any updates required for the sections below?

Previous firewall-related sections:
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#install-guide/disable_firewall.html - is this still valid? should we add firewalld info here? or xref to new section? or just replace it with the firewalld topic?
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/index.html#install-guide/preparing_connectivity.html - any updates?
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#security-guide/configuring_iptables.html - any updates?

Also [~gholms] did you have something else in mind with " example of what an enabled firewalld looks like and how to address that." (comment above)
Note to self: apply this (eliminate deprecated commands) https://access.redhat.com/sites/default/files/attachments/rhel_5_6_7_cheatsheet_27x36_1014_jcs_web.pdf

Note that Vika suggested merging the previous firewall page with http://docs.hpcloud.com/eucalyptus/4.2.2/#install-guide/preparing_connectivity.html in DOC-1775 and asked [~tony] for advice. 

See also my comment (2nd above) for more questions on this review, please.

ping [~gholms] 

Please review and approve this new topic:
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#install-guide/upgrade_rhel7_firewalld.html

[~lincoln.thomas] suggests deleting this topic in favor of the new one (above) - agreed?
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#install-guide/disable_firewall.html 

Other firewall-related sections:
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/index.html#install-guide/preparing_connectivity.html - any updates?
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#security-guide/configuring_iptables.html - any updates?

Also [~gholms] did you have anything else in mind with "example of what an enabled firewalld looks like and how to address that." 
(in your comment above)

[~gholms] ^ see comment above plus another note from [~tsugawa] - 

Are both “Disable the Firewall” (http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#install-guide/disable_firewall.html ) and “Disable FirewallD on RHEL 7” (http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#install-guide/rhel7_disable_firewalld.html) sections needed? Perhaps just merge?
Merging them seems like an excellent idea to me.

4.2.2 version - https://docs.hpcloud.com/eucalyptus/4.2.2/#install-guide/disable_firewall.html
deleted 4.3.0 version - see attached PDF  [^DisableFirewall_sectionDeleted.pdf] 

4.3.0 version - "merged" version - will appear in MIDNIGHT doc build -
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#install-guide/rhel7_disable_firewalld.html

[~gholms] please review and approve the updated "merged" version. I am not confident with the intro (why) and result (what next) content.

[~lincoln.thomas] I updated the 2 RHEL 7 upgrade topics to include the dependencies sections in step 3 (the xrefs bypassed the dependencies before now).
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#install-guide/rhel7_upgrade_nc_hosts.html
http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/documentation/origin/master/#install-guide/rhel7_upgrade_non_nc_hosts.html
Still needs review and approval. Gracias.
Resolving since I've not heard otherwise.
